name: Cuddle Snakes
description:
Cuddle Snakes was my last game of 2021. Happy New Years everyone!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move Green Snake
  • Arrow Keys - Move Blue Snake
  • R - Reset Puzzle
  • Escape - Pause/Menu

OST: https://hmasingles.bandcamp.com/track/cuddle-snakes-ost

Sounds/Music by: h_mA (https://hmamusic.bandcamp.com/)
Logo by: Ch.uuu.u (Instagram: @ch.uuu_u)
Icons by: TheGamerHuman (Discord: TheGamerHuman#5838)
